author: dhruba
msg: HADOOP-771. FileSystem.delete() takes an explicit parameter that
specifies whether a recursive delete is intended.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-872] change to spring version 2.0.6 to be consistent with activemq 5.0.0.  Also, change commons-pool to version used by spring, and change build to have these in the optional lib; change setUimaClassPath to get them from there.
